item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

hey guys, I’m adding 120 skillcapes to my server but whenever I wear them, their like transparent to my back, like the back of my player is in front of the skillcape, I know it’s not a problem with the model itself, I’ve check and made sure that it fits a 317 player, but idk if my ints are right, are these correct?

case 13353: itemDef.modelid = 13353; itemDef.name = "Agility Cape 120"; itemDef.modelZoom = 2000; // Zoom itemDef.modelRotationY = 500; itemDef.modelRotationX = 0; itemDef.modelOffset1 = -6; itemDef.modelOffset2 = 1; itemDef.anInt165 = 13353; // Male Wield View itemDef.anInt200 = 13353; // Female Wield View itemDef.itemActions = new String[5]; itemDef.groundActions = new String[5]; itemDef.groundActions[2] = "Take"; itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Wear"; itemDef.itemActions[4] = "Drop"; itemDef.description = "A cape worn only by the most agil people."; break;

I’m not much of a custom’s person so I copied a skillcape int from a Donator cape I added so I am not sure about the modeOffsets, Rotation, or zoom, help would be fantastic!
